author: dblevins
msg: THis is partially to test to see if the changes I made in the
log_accum.pl script are working and partly because the logging.conf
should have the default.* prefix like everything else.

author: dblevins
msg: This one causes the PropertiesConfigurator to be used.  To use
the DomConfigurator, just specify an xml instead.

author: dblevins
msg: No longer uses the BasicConfigurator, now you can set the log4j.configuration
system variable and configure logging to do anything you like using standard

author: dblevins
msg: Configured to use conf/logging.conf as the log4j configuration file
